short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fix for the current rolelayer extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A fix for the current RP focused helper plugin to add images, videos and media in general, and format comments on Reddit. You can also embed youtube videos and display them next to your comment for various purposes, but it's intended for background music, as the display is made to be small, as shown in the screenshot.

Source code by Vulniq
